```{r setup, echo=FALSE}
library(zoo)
library(xts)
library(tseries)
ts <- read.csv.zoo("training.csv",
                   index.column = 1,
                   FUN = as.Date, format = "%Y-%m-%d")
```

```{r mda}
ts.monthly <- zooreg(ts, frequency = 12, start = 1)
ts.add <- decompose(as.ts(ts.monthly), type = "additive")
ts.mul <- decompose(as.ts(ts.monthly), type = "multiplicative")
plot(ts.add)
plot(ts.mul)
```
